vital_signs.estrone: Below lower normal limit (23 pg/ml; reference range, 25–65 pg/ml)

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Elevated serum testosterone and free testosterone, low estrone and undetectable estradiol indicative of aromatase deficiency.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At age 17 yr and after 41 months of treatment, testosterone levels normalized and osteocalcin decreased to 88 ng/ml.

relevant_findings.growth: Increase in height by 8.5% during treatment
relevant_findings.bone_age_maturation: From 12 yr and 5 months to 16 yr and 8 months

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Consistent growth in height and maturation of bone age during treatment.
